price: 25. Jokio Laghva (purvinos, neteisingos, piktos šnekos) jie negirdės tenais, ir jokios nuodėmingos kalbos (pvz. apkalbinėjimo).
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمًا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com
